verbose_text: In line with these studies, the present study demonstrated that knockdown of SIRT1 attenuates the salidroside induced inhibition on mitochondrial dysfunction induced by ox-LDL as illustrated by the increase in MMP and the decreases in cytochrome c expression and the Bax / Bcl-2 ratio, indicating the contribution of SIRT1 to the improvement of salidroside on mitochondrial dysfunction in ox-LDL-treated HUVECs.
